summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 18698 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Terry Avenue North and Boren Avenue North, each from Denny Way to Mercer Street; Republican Street and Mercer Street, each from Westlake Avenue to Fairview Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1404 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved on June 24, 1908.
